name: Azati Software
tagline: We build digital products for users worldwide.
description:
Azati provides design & development services since 2001, helping insurance, life sciences, recruitment, media and other companies with their growth. With the Headquarter in USA and R&D center in Belarus we combine on-site and off-site presence depending on project requirements.
 
Our services include:
Research and development services:
Software Product Development
Proof of Concept implementation
Artificail Intelligence:  
Chatbots Development
Fraud Detection Systems 
Document Digitization
Stock Prediction
On-demand AI
Data Science
Data discovery, warehousing, and ETL
Predictive Analytics
Machine learning
Supervised/unsupervised learning
Natural language processing
Deep learning
Applied maths and algorithms
Domain expertise:
Life Sciences
Insurance
Media & Entertainment
HR & Recruitment
Technological expertise:
Ruby on Rails
Java
Cross-Platform and Native Mobile
R, Python
Cloud Technologies
